title: Manchester United 'willing to meet Borussia Dortmund's £100m price tag for Jadon Sancho'
text:
Manchester United 'are willing to meet Borussia Dortmund's £100million price tag for Jadon Sancho.'

The England international, 19, has been a long-standing target of the Old Trafford club and it seems they won't be deterred by the large transfer fee.

According to The Mirror, United are prepared to pay the club-record sum in order to sign the former Manchester City starlet.

Manchester United 'are prepared to meet Borussia Dortmund's £100m price' for Jadon Sancho

Sancho takes on the Schalke players during Saturday's goalless draw in the Revierderby

It would be an excellent piece of business for Dortmund, who signed Sancho from City for just £8m in the summer of 2017.

The teenager has since established himself as one of the brightest young talents in world football, scoring 18 goals and contributing 30 assists in 68 outings for the Bundesliga club.

Sancho, who has also been capped 10 times by England, has previously been linked with Real Madrid.

Dortmund are prepared to listen to offers for Sancho despite him signing a new £190,000-a-week contract back in August.

Sancho rues a missed opportunity during Saturday's goalless draw at the Veltins-Arena

Man United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer is rebuilding his squad to challenge for silverware

He has been in excellent form at the start of the campaign, with four goals and seven assists despite Dortmund's inconsistent form.

When asked for his thoughts on a return to English football recently, Sancho said: 'I can't tell the future but I wouldn't mind. La Liga I wouldn't mind also, but we don't know yet.'

Dortmund drew 0-0 in their derby match against Schalke on Saturday and sit fifth in the Bundesliga table.
description: Manchester United 'are willing to meet Borussia Dortmund's £100million price tag for Jadon Sancho.' The England international is a long-standing target of the Old Trafford club.
